channel.title: Y2k Bug on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Y2k Bug on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Time Is Running Out
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: The latter months of 1999 were like looking into the great unknown, and all thanks to a computer bug the public barely even understood. A logical person could tell you that odds were high you were going to fall asleep as the ball dropped, wake up in the morning, turn on the lights, and still hear the dulcet tones of Moby’s pop-electronica experiments rattling on the radio the next morning.
